name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior FullStack Engineer with 8 years of experience, I deliver high-performance solutions utilizing **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vercel**, **Tailwind CSS**, and **PostgreSQL**. I leverage advanced techniques in **AI**, particularly in **LLM**, **OpenAI**, and **Anthropic**, to optimize applications for automation and data pipelines. My expertise includes developing responsive and user-friendly interfaces while ensuring robust UI/UX design principles. Additionally, I implement **async operations** and **job queues** to enhance application performance.

My experience encompasses the full stack with a strong focus on building capabilities for **image generation**, **context engineering**, **agentic AI**, and both **video** and **audio generation**. I have successfully led enterprise-grade projects with **AI optimization** and explored innovative solutions involving **vector databases** and **embeddings**. I possess a solid foundation in CI/CD practices and thorough knowledge of compliance standards, ensuring secure application development aligned with industry regulations.
